typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source3
SelectCols derive(myhash = sha2(256, columns())) ~> DerivedColumn2
source1 select(mapColumn(
		year,
		Rating,
		RottenTomato
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCols
source1, DerivedColumn2 join(source1@RottenTomato == SelectCols@RottenTomato
	&& source1@Rating == SelectCols@Rating
	&& source1@year == SelectCols@year,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
source3 select(mapColumn(
		year,
		Rating,
		RottenTomato
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCols1
SelectCols1 derive(myhash1 = sha2(256,columns())) ~> DerivedColumn3
Join1 derive(fingerprint = CachedSink1#lookup(source1@year,source1@Rating,source1@RottenTomato)) ~> CachedLookup
DerivedColumn3 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	keys:['year','Rating','RottenTomato'],
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	saveOrder: 1) ~> CachedSink1
